column1: # Transaction Category Balance Test Data
# CSV fixture for comprehensive testing of transaction category balance processing
# Supports Spring Batch testing
# Schema: account_id (VARCHAR(11))
# Primary Key: (account_id
# Foreign Keys: account_id -> accounts.account_id
# Test Scenarios Covered:
# 1. Composite primary key constraint testing with unique combinations
# 2. Balance calculation validation with positive
# 3. Financial precision testing with DECIMAL(12
# 4. Category-specific balance tracking across multiple accounts
# 5. Timestamp validation for last_updated field
# 6. Balance aggregation testing scenarios
# 7. Foreign key relationship validation
# 8. Edge cases for balance limits and precision
# Data Source: Converted from app/data/ASCII/tcatbal.txt mainframe fixed-width format
# Original COBOL Structure: TRAN-CAT-BAL-RECORD (CVTRA01Y.cpy)
# Target Entity: TransactionCategoryBalance.java with composite primary key
